content.raw:
Interesting. They include each other, which doesn’t seem right. Are we recommending that downstream users include “common/detail/Plugin.hh” or “common/Plugin.hh”?

I would classify ign-common as being in error as well. While it doesn’t break anything, including the “detail” in the auto-generated header file is not the best thing to do. It’s only for aesthetic reasons.
